title: The PlayStation 5 Arrives Holiday 2020 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.08.19
description:
Bruce Greene and Greg talk about the PS5 officially being the PlayStation 5, Blizzard's ban of a Hong Kong protester, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:01:51 - Housekeeping
Bruce Greene’s We Have cool Friends is up! youtube.com/kindafunny and podcast services
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:03:19 - It’s officially PlayStation 5 and coming Holiday 2020
00:12:23 - “What do you guys think about the way Sony is handling the reveal of the PS5?” - Ignacio Rojas
00:19:20 - “What are your thoughts on Bluepoint teasing a new game?” - MultiCallum
00:24:20 - “What do you think the launch lineup looks like?” - Alex
00:35:03 - “Do you think this forces Microsoft to reveal more news about Project Scarlett at X019 a month from now?” - BJ Bernardo
00:37:14 - Blizzard Suspends Hearthstone Player for Hong Kong Support
00:48:55 - Doom Eternal Delayed
00:53:18 - CoD Mobile is a HUGE deal
00:54:47 - Out today
00:58:07 -  Hims
00:59:27 - Quip
01:00:33 - Squad Up: Michaela - PS4 - geekreate
01:02:33 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
